name: Journey Soul
description:
Synopsis:

Your take the role of a Traveler that is set upon an island filled with creatures inspired by traditional Japanese beliefs. These creatures known as Yokai are your way to gain the blessing of the Gods. You must explore the island and each of each four seasonal forests. Along your way, using the power of night and day, you will learn about, commune with and aid these Yokai as you come closer and closer to your final goal, ascending the mountain to receive your final blessing from the Gods.  

Development Team:

Producer and Game Designer: Sean Dobson 

Programmer: Daniel Holmes  

3D and General Artists: Joshua Panetta, Joshua Klein, Andrew Tripp
